## QuaternaryShellPlot.setOpacityFn() method

Set the opacity function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setOpacityFn(fn: (sample: ISample, dp: DataProvider) => number): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | (sample: [ISample](./composition-plot.isample.md)<!-- -->, dp: [DataProvider](./composition-plot.dataprovider.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; number | Returns a fill opacity for a given sample |
